title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.8 - Presence within draw zone prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.8 - Presence within draw zone prohibited

State Regulations

No vehicle or person other than employees of the commission
or workmen engaged in maintenance, repairs or bridge operation, shall enter or
remain within the draw zone when the gates have been closed for the purpose of
operating the draw span. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
